tweet: Happy Halloween, #AZ01! pic.twitter.com/ERT5OsLk4v

ICYMI: Last night, the House voted to pass the Grand Canyon Centennial Protection Act, commonsense legislation I introduced w/ my colleagues that would permanently protect the #GrandCanyon and #AZ01 communities from the dangers of uranium mining. http://bit.ly/2N286bg

#AZ01: I voted in favor of today's resolution to ensure that this ongoing inquiry remains transparent to the American people and allows them to form their own judgments based on fact. My full statement: http://bit.ly/2WuBzh3

I am pleased that the House Agriculture Committee voted to pass H.R.4895, legislation to reauthorize the Commodity Futures Trade Commission, giving the agency more tools to detect, investigate, and stop financial fraud. Watch my remarks during today's markup of the bill: #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/fUxvqv2Jdu

Today, the House of took historic action to protect our #AZ01 #GrandCanyon from the multifaceted damage of uranium mining by passing the Grand Canyon Centennial Protection Act, a bill to permanently ban uranium mining in and near the Canyon. My statement:  http://bit.ly/2BZA558  pic.twitter.com/ZzrIdTED2G

WATCH: The Grand Canyon is too precious to lose. I urge my colleagues to join me today in voting to pass the Grand Canyon Centennial Protection Act to permanently safeguard the Canyon & surrounding #AZ01 areas from the risks posed by uranium mining. My speech on the House floor: pic.twitter.com/nvF5lBgfk3

REMINDER: I will be holding veterans town halls in Winslow and Flagstaff this Saturday and Monday. I am looking forward to answering your questions and discussing the issues affecting #AZ01 veterans. Details:  http://bit.ly/2oA97NO  pic.twitter.com/OPpjnt5eIc

In 2018, domestic and international travel to #AZ01 generated $2.1 billion in economic impact and supported over 18,000 jobs. It is critical that we reauthorize Brand USA and support key public-private partnerships that bolster our state's tourism economy. pic.twitter.com/4foAZ09EgT

ICYMI: Last night, the House voted to pass the Payment Commission Data Act, a bipartisan bill I intro'd that would increase transparency in the drug pricing system by ensuring that experts have the data they need to make recommendations to Congress. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2JujwCa
Great speaking with @cronkitenews today about the upcoming vote on the Grand Canyon Centennial Act and its importance to #AZ01. pic.twitter.com/BNZoEqZZG7

WATCH: Today, I joined my colleagues on @EnergyCommerce in urging the FCC to hold a public auction of C-Band airwaves. There must be accountability and transparency when it comes to broadband access for rural and underserved #AZ01 communities. My remarks: pic.twitter.com/AJ6FJCDOYS

In the coming week, I will be hosting a series of town halls across #AZ01 to hear directly from veterans about their concerns. Details below and here:  http://bit.ly/2oA97NO  pic.twitter.com/zydABOp9LM

#AZ01: Today, the House of Reps voted to pass my bipartisan bill to lower prescription drug costs. The Payment Commission Data Act increases transparency in Rx pricing by giving experts access to data they need to provide recommendations to Congress. More:  http://bit.ly/2JujwCa  pic.twitter.com/6Lon7bF1dF

ICYMI: Every day, I hear from Arizonans concerned about the skyrocketing costs of their prescription drugs. I'm working to address this crisis & ensure that no #AZ01 family must make the choice between medication & putting food on the table. Read my op-ed: http://bit.ly/2PgmXjR
Starting this Saturday, I am hosting a week of veterans town halls across #AZ01. Visit my website for details about a town hall coming to a community near you: http://bit.ly/2pblcKg

This weekend, I attended the WWI Veteran Honors Ceremony for Cremains in #AZ01. It was an honor to attend this moving tribute to the brave veterans who lost their lives serving our country and were never given a formal burial. pic.twitter.com/J4s0J5IqDB
Happy Diwali #AZ01! Sending warm wishes to all who celebrate. pic.twitter.com/hzM1wfDXfw

Donna, a constituent of mine in #AZ01, reached out to my office & shared the story of her brother, Bob, who passed away from ALS 13 years ago today. In honor of Bob, I've joined the Congressional ALS Caucus to identify research funding & search for a cure. http://bit.ly/2WfmoYM
This week, I met with @ASU to discuss ways we can expand research opportunities in STEM and make sure  #AZ01 students have access to the resources they need to succeed. pic.twitter.com/OE2vOIeRHu

ICYMI: My colleagues on Energy and Commerce voted to pass my bill, the Medicare Vision Act, out of committee to ensure that #AZ01 seniors are able to access essential, comprehensive vision care, glasses, and contacts under Medicare. http://bit.ly/33KFyZj

Yesterday, my wife Pat and I had the pleasure of partnering with Jumpstart and the @PreKCaucus to film a PSA discussing the importance of reading to children. Video to come! #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/eIMnWMkird

I have heard from countless #AZ01 families and seniors concerned about the high cost of prescription drugs. We must take a holistic approach to address this crisis and ensure that Americans can access the medications they need. http://bit.ly/2PgmXjR
This week, I met with the Town of Superior to hear about their efforts to expand area infrastructure and economic growth. When rural America succeeds, we all succeed. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/bAAZhFfpeD

As our energy marketplace evolves, we must work to ensure a smooth economic transition and generate new options for economic development in our rural communities. I introduced the PROMISE Act to assist #AZ01 communities affected by the closure of NGS. http://bit.ly/2JlUbKN

Today, we bid farewell to our friend Elijah. Your lifelong dedication to public service, the people of Maryland, and the progress of this nation will not soon be forgotten. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/PdY8WGVWyY

Casa Grande Ruins Natl Monument attracts visitors from all over the world. I intro'd legislation to expand the Ruins to protect historic lands important to Native American religious traditions & bolster the tourism economy of southern #AZ01 communities. http://bit.ly/32LnNc6

Today, I met with the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers and Trainmen to discuss the importance of train safety at our border and across our country. Thank you for meeting with me to discuss how we can best support our #AZ01 transportation workers. pic.twitter.com/Ts1HjpxA0K

#AZ01: Election security is not a partisan issue. Today, the House of Reps took a step forward in protecting our election infrastructure from foreign actors and preserving the integrity of our democracy by passing the commonsense SHIELD Act. My statement:  http://bit.ly/33XrrzM  pic.twitter.com/FWNH7459f6

ICYMI: I participated in a roundtable discussion about the importance of addressing the lack of affordable, high quality child care programs in #AZ01 and across our country. Vision care is an essential part of comprehensive health care for #AZ01 seniors. I intro'd the Medicare Vision Act to expand Medicare to cover routine exams, glasses & contacts. http://bit.ly/32Bk5Sp

#AZ01 families should not have to choose between the medication they need and putting food on the table. Today, I spoke on the House floor about the skyrocketing costs of prescription drugs. WATCH: pic.twitter.com/ZhGRyzv9gs

My heart breaks for the family of Antonio Garcia, a brave, young Arizonan who was training to defend our nation. I know this loss will leave an indelible mark on his loved ones & the 1st Armored Brigade; I wish them comfort in this time of grief. http://bit.ly/2MCvGLp

October is #DomesticViolenceAwarenessMonth. As a former cop, I saw the impacts of domestic violence on many families, and know the power these heinous acts can hold.  If you are experiencing DV, I urge you to contact the National Domestic Violence Hotline at 1-800-799-7233. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/6UQJ02q0OY

It was my honor to present the Congressional Gold Medal and a flag flown over the U.S. Capitol to Ron Maassen on behalf of his father's service. Ron's father, Ralph Maassen, served in the 492nd Bombardment Group of the Eighth Air Force during WWII. #AZ01

ICYMI: Last week I introduced the Medicare Vision Act to expand Medicare to cover routine vision care for #AZ01 seniors. #AZ01 is one of the largest districts in the country. My staff holds mobile office hours across the district to ensure that all communities have access to constituent services. ICYMI: Navajo & Hopi tribes will see ancestral remains returned from Finland. Theft of #AZ01 tribal items has gone on for too long w/ no accountability. I cosponsored the STOP Act to ensure that tribal sovereignty & cultural history are respected. http://bit.ly/2AGPDtF

This week, I introduced an amendment to the Lower Drug Costs Now Act to establish a grant program to incentivize doctors to live & work in rural & medically underserved areas. Investments like these ensure that quality care is accessible to all #AZ01 communities. WATCH: pic.twitter.com/7PHbl25vuF

As a member of the bipartisan Task Force to End Sexual Violence, I participated in a roundtable where we discussed the steps Congress can take to address the growing crisis of missing and murdered Native American women. Last night, @EnergyCommerce voted to pass the Medicare Vision Act out of committee to the full House for a vote. I'm proud to have joined my colleagues to intro this bill & look forward to seeing the good it will do to expand vision care for #AZ01 seniors. http://bit.ly/33KFyZj

Today is National Mammography day, which serves as a reminder that the best defense to preventing breast cancer is early detection. 1 in 8 women are diagnosed with breast cancer and this preventative care can be life saving. #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/GhWD4ypROq

#AZ01: We must take a holistic approach to lower the cost of Rx drugs by increasing transparency in the drug pricing industry, protecting innovation, & allowing Medicare to negotiate. My statement on our full day markup of the Lower Drug Costs Now Act: http://bit.ly/31vCRcl

Today is the 47th anniversary of the #CleanWaterAct, historic legislation that has safeguarded our most valuable resource for years. An estimated 20.5 million Medicare beneficiaries have vision problems, yet only 57% said they had received an eye exam during the previous year. I intro'd the Medicare Vision Act to expand Medicare to cover routine vision exams & glasses for #AZ01 seniors. http://bit.ly/33FnIXI

This Congress has lost an awesome voice for the American people with the passing of Rep. Elijah Cummings. Today, my heart is heavy and my thoughts are with his wife, Maya, his children, and the people of Maryland's Seventh District, who must bear this tremendous loss.
